changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE person ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT person_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) )

CREATE TABLE app_user ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, login VARCHAR(25) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, blocked BOOLEAN NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT app_user_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT app_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES person (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )
